page.title: 04SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY.
page.content: Robertson Research International Ltd.,Ty'n y Coed,Llanrhos,Llandudno employs 500 people.It is consultant to oil and mineral exploration industry,with it's main building at Deganwy.It has an engineering works at Deganwy and a store at Glan Conwy .The company has offices at Houston, Singapore,London,Aberdeen,Calgary,and Sydney.44% of the present workforce have been with the company for under 5 years and 22% have worked for the company for over ten years.56% of the staff are involved at present in scientific/technical work while the others work in managerial and administrative work.40% use scientific equipment for their work,while 34% use computers and business machines.20% travel overseas with their work-Africa Europe,U.S.A and Asia.
